00080 /* Generic functions, reused by add strip operators */
00081 
00082 /* avoid passing multiple args and be more verbose */
00083 #define SEQPROP_STARTFRAME  (1 << 0)
00084 #define SEQPROP_ENDFRAME    (1 << 1)
00085 #define SEQPROP_NOPATHS     (1 << 2)
00086 #define SEQPROP_NOCHAN      (1 << 3)
00087 
00088 #define SELECT 1
00089 
00090 static void sequencer_generic_props__internal(wmOperatorType *ot, int flag)
00091 {
00092     if (flag & SEQPROP_STARTFRAME)
00093         RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "frame_start", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Start Frame", "Start frame of the sequence strip", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
00094     
00095     if (flag & SEQPROP_ENDFRAME)
00096         RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "frame_end", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "End Frame", "End frame for the color strip", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);  /* not usual since most strips have a fixed length */
00097     
00098     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "channel", 1, 1, MAXSEQ, "Channel", "Channel to place this strip into", 1, MAXSEQ);
00099     
00100     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "replace_sel", 1, "Replace Selection", "Replace the current selection");
00101 
00102     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "overlap", 0, "Allow Overlap", "Don't correct overlap on new sequence strips");
00103 }
00104 
00105 static void sequencer_generic_invoke_path__internal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, const char *identifier)
00106 {
00107     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, identifier)) {
00108         Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00109         Sequence *last_seq = seq_active_get(scene);
00110         if (last_seq && last_seq->strip && SEQ_HAS_PATH(last_seq)) {
00111             char path[sizeof(last_seq->strip->dir)];
00112             BLI_strncpy(path, last_seq->strip->dir, sizeof(path));
00113             BLI_path_abs(path, G.main->name);
00114             RNA_string_set(op->ptr, identifier, path);
00115         }
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 static void sequencer_generic_invoke_xy__internal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event, int flag)
00120 {
00121     View2D *v2d = UI_view2d_fromcontext(C);
00122     
00123     float mval_v2d[2];
00124     
00125     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &mval_v2d[0], &mval_v2d[1]);
00126 
00127     /* effect strips don't need a channel initialized from the mouse */
00128     if (!(flag & SEQPROP_NOCHAN)) {
00129         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "channel", (int)mval_v2d[1] + 0.5f);
00130     }
00131 
00132     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "frame_start", (int)mval_v2d[0]);
00133     
00134     if ((flag & SEQPROP_ENDFRAME) && RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "frame_end") == 0)
00135         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "frame_end", (int)mval_v2d[0] + 25);  // XXX arbitary but ok for now.
00136 
00137     if (!(flag & SEQPROP_NOPATHS)) {
00138         sequencer_generic_invoke_path__internal(C, op, "filepath");
00139         sequencer_generic_invoke_path__internal(C, op, "directory");
00140     }
00141 }
00142 
00143 static void seq_load_operator_info(SeqLoadInfo *seq_load, wmOperator *op)
00144 {
00145     int relative = RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "relative_path") && RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "relative_path");
00146     int is_file = -1;
00147     memset(seq_load, 0, sizeof(SeqLoadInfo));
00148 
00149     seq_load->start_frame =  RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "frame_start");
00150     seq_load->end_frame =    seq_load->start_frame; /* un-set */
00151 
00152     seq_load->channel =      RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "channel");
00153     seq_load->len =          1; // images only, if endframe isn't set!
00154 
00155     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "filepath")) {
00156         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", seq_load->path); /* full path, file is set by the caller */
00157         is_file = 1;
00158     }
00159     else if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "directory")) {
00160         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "directory", seq_load->path); /* full path, file is set by the caller */
00161         is_file = 0;
00162     }
00163 
00164     if ((is_file != -1) && relative)
00165         BLI_path_rel(seq_load->path, G.main->name);
00166 
00167     
00168     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "frame_end")) {
00169         seq_load->end_frame = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "frame_end");
00170     }
00171 
00172     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "replace_sel") && RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "replace_sel"))
00173         seq_load->flag |= SEQ_LOAD_REPLACE_SEL;
00174 
00175     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "cache") && RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "cache"))
00176         seq_load->flag |= SEQ_LOAD_SOUND_CACHE;
00177 
00178     if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "sound") && RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "sound"))
00179         seq_load->flag |= SEQ_LOAD_MOVIE_SOUND;
00180 
00181     /* always use this for ops */
00182     seq_load->flag |= SEQ_LOAD_FRAME_ADVANCE;
00183 
00184 
00185     if (is_file == 1) {
00186         BLI_strncpy(seq_load->name, BLI_path_basename(seq_load->path), sizeof(seq_load->name));
00187     }
00188     else if (RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "files")) {
00189         /* used for image strip */
00190         /* best guess, first images name */
00191         RNA_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, "files") {
00192             char *name = RNA_string_get_alloc(&itemptr, "name", NULL, 0);
00193             BLI_strncpy(seq_load->name, name, sizeof(seq_load->name));
00194             MEM_freeN(name);
00195             break;
00196         }
00197         RNA_END;
00198     }
00199 }
00200 
00201 /* add scene operator */
00202 static int sequencer_add_scene_strip_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00203 {
00204     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00205     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, TRUE);
00206     
00207     Scene *sce_seq;
00208 
00209     Sequence *seq;  /* generic strip vars */
00210     Strip *strip;
00211     
00212     int start_frame, channel; /* operator props */
00213     
00214     start_frame = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "frame_start");
00215     channel = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "channel");
00216     
00217     sce_seq = BLI_findlink(&CTX_data_main(C)->scene, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "scene"));
00218     
00219     if (sce_seq == NULL) {
00220         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Scene not found");
00221         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00222     }
00223     
00224     seq = alloc_sequence(ed->seqbasep, start_frame, channel);
00225     seq->type = SEQ_SCENE;
00226     seq->blend_mode = SEQ_CROSS; /* so alpha adjustment fade to the strip below */
00227 
00228     seq->scene = sce_seq;
00229     
00230     /* basic defaults */
00231     seq->strip = strip = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Strip), "strip");
00232     seq->len = sce_seq->r.efra - sce_seq->r.sfra + 1;
00233     strip->us = 1;
00234     
00235     BLI_strncpy(seq->name + 2, sce_seq->id.name + 2, sizeof(seq->name) - 2);
00236     seqbase_unique_name_recursive(&ed->seqbase, seq);
00237 
00238     seq->scene_sound = sound_scene_add_scene_sound(scene, seq, start_frame, start_frame + seq->len, 0);
00239 
00240     calc_sequence_disp(scene, seq);
00241     sort_seq(scene);
00242     
00243     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "replace_sel")) {
00244         deselect_all_seq(scene);
00245         seq_active_set(scene, seq);
00246         seq->flag |= SELECT;
00247     }
00248 
00249     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "overlap") == FALSE) {
00250         if (seq_test_overlap(ed->seqbasep, seq)) shuffle_seq(ed->seqbasep, seq, scene);
00251     }
00252 
00253     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER, scene);
00254     
00255     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00256 }
00257 
00258 
00259 static int sequencer_add_scene_strip_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00260 {
00261     if (!ED_operator_sequencer_active(C)) {
00262         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Sequencer area not active");
00263         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00264     }
00265 
00266     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "scene"))
00267         return WM_enum_search_invoke(C, op, event);
00268 
00269     sequencer_generic_invoke_xy__internal(C, op, event, 0);
00270     return sequencer_add_scene_strip_exec(C, op);
00271     // needs a menu
00272     // return WM_menu_invoke(C, op, event);
00273 }

00276 void SEQUENCER_OT_scene_strip_add(struct wmOperatorType *ot)
00277 {
00278     PropertyRNA *prop;
00279     
00280     /* identifiers */
00281     ot->name = "Add Scene Strip";
00282     ot->idname = "SEQUENCER_OT_scene_strip_add";
00283     ot->description = "Add a strip to the sequencer using a blender scene as a source";
00284 
00285     /* api callbacks */
00286     ot->invoke = sequencer_add_scene_strip_invoke;
00287     ot->exec = sequencer_add_scene_strip_exec;
00288 
00289     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00290     
00291     /* flags */
00292     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00293     
00294     sequencer_generic_props__internal(ot, SEQPROP_STARTFRAME);
00295     prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "scene", DummyRNA_NULL_items, 0, "Scene", "");
00296     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, RNA_scene_itemf);
00297     ot->prop = prop;
00298 }

00300 /* add movieclip operator */
00301 static int sequencer_add_movieclip_strip_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00302 {
00303     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00304     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, TRUE);
00305     
00306     MovieClip *clip;
00307 
00308     Sequence *seq;  /* generic strip vars */
00309     Strip *strip;
00310     
00311     int start_frame, channel; /* operator props */
00312     
00313     start_frame = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "frame_start");
00314     channel = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "channel");
00315     
00316     clip = BLI_findlink(&CTX_data_main(C)->movieclip, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "clip"));
00317     
00318     if (clip == NULL) {
00319         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "MovieClip not found");
00320         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00321     }
00322     
00323     seq = alloc_sequence(ed->seqbasep, start_frame, channel);
00324     seq->type = SEQ_MOVIECLIP;
00325     seq->blend_mode = SEQ_CROSS;
00326     seq->clip = clip;
00327 
00328     if (seq->clip->id.us == 0)
00329         seq->clip->id.us = 1;
00330 
00331     /* basic defaults */
00332     seq->strip = strip = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Strip), "strip");
00333     seq->len =  BKE_movieclip_get_duration(clip);
00334     strip->us = 1;
00335     
00336     BLI_strncpy(seq->name + 2, clip->id.name + 2, sizeof(seq->name) - 2);
00337     seqbase_unique_name_recursive(&ed->seqbase, seq);
00338 
00339     calc_sequence_disp(scene, seq);
00340     sort_seq(scene);
00341     
00342     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "replace_sel")) {
00343         deselect_all_seq(scene);
00344         seq_active_set(scene, seq);
00345         seq->flag |= SELECT;
00346     }
00347 
00348     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "overlap") == FALSE) {
00349         if (seq_test_overlap(ed->seqbasep, seq)) shuffle_seq(ed->seqbasep, seq, scene);
00350     }
00351 
00352     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER, scene);
00353     
00354     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00355 }

00360     if (!ED_operator_sequencer_active(C)) {

00365     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "clip"))
00366         return WM_enum_search_invoke(C, op, event);
00367

00369     return sequencer_add_movieclip_strip_exec(C, op);
00370     // needs a menu
00371     // return WM_menu_invoke(C, op, event);
00372 }

00399 
00400 static int sequencer_add_generic_strip_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, SeqLoadFunc seq_load_func)
00401 {
00402     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C); /* only for sound */
00403     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, TRUE);
00404     SeqLoadInfo seq_load;
00405     Sequence *seq;
00406     int tot_files;
00407     const short overlap = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "overlap");
00408 
00409     seq_load_operator_info(&seq_load, op);
00410 
00411     if (seq_load.flag & SEQ_LOAD_REPLACE_SEL)
00412         deselect_all_seq(scene);
00413 
00414     tot_files = RNA_property_collection_length(op->ptr, RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "files"));
00415 
00416     if (tot_files) {
00417         /* multiple files */
00418         char dir_only[FILE_MAX];
00419         char file_only[FILE_MAX];
00420 
00421         BLI_split_dir_part(seq_load.path, dir_only, sizeof(dir_only));
00422 
00423         RNA_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, "files")
00424         {
00425             RNA_string_get(&itemptr, "name", file_only);
00426             BLI_join_dirfile(seq_load.path, sizeof(seq_load.path), dir_only, file_only);
00427 
00428             seq = seq_load_func(C, ed->seqbasep, &seq_load);
00429             if (seq) {
00430                 if (overlap == FALSE) {
00431                     if (seq_test_overlap(ed->seqbasep, seq)) shuffle_seq(ed->seqbasep, seq, scene);
00432                 }
00433             }
00434         }
00435         RNA_END;
00436     }
00437     else {
00438         /* single file */
00439         seq = seq_load_func(C, ed->seqbasep, &seq_load);
00440         if (seq) {
00441             if (overlap == FALSE) {
00442                 if (seq_test_overlap(ed->seqbasep, seq)) shuffle_seq(ed->seqbasep, seq, scene);
00443             }
00444         }
00445     }
00446 
00447     if (seq_load.tot_success == 0) {
00448         BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "File \"%s\" could not be loaded", seq_load.path);
00449         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00450     }
00451 
00452     sort_seq(scene);
00453     seq_update_muting(ed);
00454 
00455     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER, scene);
00456 
00457     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00458 }

00460 /* add movie operator */
00461 static int sequencer_add_movie_strip_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00462 {
00463     return sequencer_add_generic_strip_exec(C, op, sequencer_add_movie_strip);
00464 }
00465 
00466 
00467 static int sequencer_add_movie_strip_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00468 {
00469 
00470     if (!ED_operator_sequencer_active(C)) {
00471         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Sequencer area not active");
00472         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00473     }
00474 
00475     /* This is for drag and drop */
00476     if ((RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "files") && RNA_collection_length(op->ptr, "files")) ||
00477         RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath"))
00478     {
00479         sequencer_generic_invoke_xy__internal(C, op, event, SEQPROP_NOPATHS);
00480         return sequencer_add_movie_strip_exec(C, op);
00481     }
00482     
00483     sequencer_generic_invoke_xy__internal(C, op, event, 0);
00484     
00485     WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
00486     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00487 
00488     //return sequencer_add_movie_strip_exec(C, op);
00489 }

00492 void SEQUENCER_OT_movie_strip_add(struct wmOperatorType *ot)

00499 
00500     /* api callbacks */
00501     ot->invoke = sequencer_add_movie_strip_invoke;
00502     ot->exec = sequencer_add_movie_strip_exec;
00503 
00504     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00505     
00506     /* flags */
00507     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00508     
00509     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE | MOVIEFILE, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_OPENFILE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH | WM_FILESEL_RELPATH | WM_FILESEL_FILES, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
00510     sequencer_generic_props__internal(ot, SEQPROP_STARTFRAME);
00511     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "sound", TRUE, "Sound", "Load sound with the movie");
00512 }

00527     }

00529     /* This is for drag and drop */
00530     if ((RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "files") && RNA_collection_length(op->ptr, "files")) ||
00531         RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath"))
00532     {
00533         sequencer_generic_invoke_xy__internal(C, op, event, SEQPROP_NOPATHS);
00534         return sequencer_add_sound_strip_exec(C, op);
00535     }
00536

00538

00540     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00541 
00542     //return sequencer_add_sound_strip_exec(C, op);
00543 }

00567 
00568 /* add image operator */
00569 static int sequencer_add_image_strip_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00570 {
00571     /* cant use the generic function for this */
00572 
00573     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C); /* only for sound */
00574     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, TRUE);
00575     SeqLoadInfo seq_load;
00576     Sequence *seq;
00577 
00578     Strip *strip;
00579     StripElem *se;
00580 
00581     seq_load_operator_info(&seq_load, op);
00582 
00583     /* images are unique in how they handle this - 1 per strip elem */
00584     seq_load.len = RNA_property_collection_length(op->ptr, RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "files"));
00585 
00586     if (seq_load.len == 0)
00587         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00588 
00589     if (seq_load.flag & SEQ_LOAD_REPLACE_SEL)
00590         deselect_all_seq(scene);
00591 
00592 
00593     /* main adding function */
00594     seq = sequencer_add_image_strip(C, ed->seqbasep, &seq_load);
00595     strip = seq->strip;
00596     se = strip->stripdata;
00597 
00598     RNA_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, "files") {
00599         char *filename = RNA_string_get_alloc(&itemptr, "name", NULL, 0);
00600         BLI_strncpy(se->name, filename, sizeof(se->name));
00601         MEM_freeN(filename);
00602         se++;
00603     }
00604     RNA_END;
00605 
00606     if (seq_load.len == 1) {
00607         if (seq_load.start_frame < seq_load.end_frame) {
00608             seq->endstill = seq_load.end_frame - seq_load.start_frame;
00609         }
00610     }
00611     
00612     calc_sequence_disp(scene, seq);
00613 
00614     sort_seq(scene);
00615 
00616     /* last active name */
00617     strncpy(ed->act_imagedir, strip->dir, FILE_MAXDIR - 1);
00618 
00619     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "overlap") == FALSE) {
00620         if (seq_test_overlap(ed->seqbasep, seq)) shuffle_seq(ed->seqbasep, seq, scene);
00621     }
00622 
00623     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER, scene);
00624 
00625     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00626 }
00627 
00628 static int sequencer_add_image_strip_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00629 {
00630 
00631     if (!ED_operator_sequencer_active(C)) {
00632         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Sequencer area not active");
00633         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00634     }
00635 
00636 
00637     /* drag drop has set the names */
00638     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "files") && RNA_collection_length(op->ptr, "files")) {
00639         sequencer_generic_invoke_xy__internal(C, op, event, SEQPROP_ENDFRAME | SEQPROP_NOPATHS);
00640         return sequencer_add_image_strip_exec(C, op);
00641     }
00642     
00643     sequencer_generic_invoke_xy__internal(C, op, event, SEQPROP_ENDFRAME);
00644 
00645     WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
00646     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00647 }
00648 
00649 
00650 void SEQUENCER_OT_image_strip_add(struct wmOperatorType *ot)
00651 {
00652     
00653     /* identifiers */
00654     ot->name = "Add Image Strip";
00655     ot->idname = "SEQUENCER_OT_image_strip_add";
00656     ot->description = "Add an image or image sequence to the sequencer";
00657 
00658     /* api callbacks */
00659     ot->invoke = sequencer_add_image_strip_invoke;
00660     ot->exec = sequencer_add_image_strip_exec;
00661 
00662     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00663     
00664     /* flags */
00665     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00666     
00667     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE | IMAGEFILE, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_OPENFILE, WM_FILESEL_DIRECTORY | WM_FILESEL_RELPATH | WM_FILESEL_FILES, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
00668     sequencer_generic_props__internal(ot, SEQPROP_STARTFRAME | SEQPROP_ENDFRAME);
00669 }
00670 
00671 
00672 /* add_effect_strip operator */
00673 static int sequencer_add_effect_strip_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00674 {
00675     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00676     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, TRUE);
00677 
00678     Sequence *seq;  /* generic strip vars */
00679     Strip *strip;
00680     struct SeqEffectHandle sh;
00681 
00682     int start_frame, end_frame, channel, type; /* operator props */
00683     
00684     Sequence *seq1, *seq2, *seq3;
00685     const char *error_msg;
00686 
00687     start_frame = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "frame_start");
00688     end_frame = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "frame_end");
00689     channel = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "channel");
00690 
00691     type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00692     
00693     // XXX move to invoke
00694     if (!seq_effect_find_selected(scene, NULL, type, &seq1, &seq2, &seq3, &error_msg)) {
00695         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, error_msg);
00696         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00697     }
00698 
00699     /* If seq1 is NULL and no error was raised it means the seq is standalone
00700      * (like color strips) and we need to check its start and end frames are valid */
00701     if (seq1 == NULL && end_frame <= start_frame) {
00702         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Start and end frame are not set");
00703         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00704     }
00705 
00706     seq = alloc_sequence(ed->seqbasep, start_frame, channel);
00707     seq->type = type;
00708 
00709     BLI_strncpy(seq->name + 2, give_seqname(seq), sizeof(seq->name) - 2);
00710     seqbase_unique_name_recursive(&ed->seqbase, seq);
00711 
00712     sh = get_sequence_effect(seq);
00713 
00714     seq->seq1 = seq1;
00715     seq->seq2 = seq2;
00716     seq->seq3 = seq3;
00717 
00718     sh.init(seq);
00719 
00720     if (!seq1) { /* effect has no deps */
00721         seq->len = 1;
00722         seq_tx_set_final_right(seq, end_frame);
00723     }
00724 
00725     seq->flag |= SEQ_USE_EFFECT_DEFAULT_FADE;
00726 
00727     calc_sequence(scene, seq);
00728     
00729     /* basic defaults */
00730     seq->strip = strip = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Strip), "strip");
00731     strip->us = 1;
00732 
00733     if (seq->type == SEQ_PLUGIN) {
00734         char path[FILE_MAX];
00735         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
00736 
00737         sh.init_plugin(seq, path);
00738 
00739         if (seq->plugin == NULL) {
00740             BLI_remlink(ed->seqbasep, seq);
00741             seq_free_sequence(scene, seq);
00742             BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Sequencer plugin \"%s\" could not load", path);
00743             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00744         }
00745     }
00746     else if (seq->type == SEQ_COLOR) {
00747         SolidColorVars *colvars = (SolidColorVars *)seq->effectdata;
00748         RNA_float_get_array(op->ptr, "color", colvars->col);
00749         seq->blend_mode = SEQ_CROSS; /* so alpha adjustment fade to the strip below */
00750 
00751     }
00752     else if (seq->type == SEQ_ADJUSTMENT) {
00753         seq->blend_mode = SEQ_CROSS;
00754     }
00755 
00756     /* an unset channel is a special case where we automatically go above
00757      * the other strips. */
00758     if (!RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "channel")) {
00759         if (seq->seq1) {
00760             int chan = MAX3(seq->seq1 ? seq->seq1->machine : 0,
00761                             seq->seq2 ? seq->seq2->machine : 0,
00762                             seq->seq3 ? seq->seq3->machine : 0);
00763             if (chan < MAXSEQ)
00764                 seq->machine = chan;
00765         }
00766     }
00767 
00768     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "overlap") == FALSE) {
00769         if (seq_test_overlap(ed->seqbasep, seq)) shuffle_seq(ed->seqbasep, seq, scene);
00770     }
00771 
00772     update_changed_seq_and_deps(scene, seq, 1, 1); /* runs calc_sequence */
00773 
00774 
00775     /* not sure if this is needed with update_changed_seq_and_deps.
00776      * it was NOT called in blender 2.4x, but wont hurt */
00777     sort_seq(scene); 
00778 
00779     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "replace_sel")) {
00780         deselect_all_seq(scene);
00781         seq_active_set(scene, seq);
00782         seq->flag |= SELECT;
00783     }
00784 
00785     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_SEQUENCER, scene);
00786 
00787     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00788 }
00789 
00790 
00791 /* add color */
00792 static int sequencer_add_effect_strip_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00793 {
00794     short is_type_set = RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "type");
00795     int type = -1;
00796     int prop_flag = SEQPROP_ENDFRAME;
00797 
00798     if (!ED_operator_sequencer_active(C)) {
00799         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Sequencer area not active");
00800         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00801     }
00802 
00803     if (is_type_set) {
00804         type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00805 
00806         /* when invoking an effect strip which uses inputs,
00807          * skip initializing the channel from the mouse.
00808          * Instead leave the property unset so exec() initializes it to be
00809          * above the strips its applied to. */
00810         if (get_sequence_effect_num_inputs(type) != 0) {
00811             prop_flag |= SEQPROP_NOCHAN;
00812         }
00813     }
00814 
00815     sequencer_generic_invoke_xy__internal(C, op, event, prop_flag);
00816 
00817     if (is_type_set && type == SEQ_PLUGIN) {
00818         /* only plugins need the file selector */
00819         WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
00820         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00821     }
00822     else {
00823         return sequencer_add_effect_strip_exec(C, op);
00824     }
00825 }
00826 
00827 void SEQUENCER_OT_effect_strip_add(struct wmOperatorType *ot)
00828 {
00829     /* identifiers */
00830     ot->name = "Add Effect Strip";
00831     ot->idname = "SEQUENCER_OT_effect_strip_add";
00832     ot->description = "Add an effect to the sequencer, most are applied on top of existing strips";
00833 
00834     /* api callbacks */
00835     ot->invoke = sequencer_add_effect_strip_invoke;
00836     ot->exec = sequencer_add_effect_strip_exec;
00837 
00838     ot->poll = ED_operator_scene_editable;
00839     
00840     /* flags */
00841     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00842     
00843     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, 0, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_OPENFILE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH | WM_FILESEL_RELPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
00844     sequencer_generic_props__internal(ot, SEQPROP_STARTFRAME | SEQPROP_ENDFRAME);
00845     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", sequencer_prop_effect_types, SEQ_CROSS, "Type", "Sequencer effect type");
00846     RNA_def_float_vector(ot->srna, "color", 3, NULL, 0.0f, 1.0f, "Color", "Initialize the strip with this color (only used when type='COLOR')", 0.0f, 1.0f);
00847 }
